body.value:
T.H. Lehnen is a much shorter name than 'Timothy MacKay Hestenes Lehnen' and fits better on a book jacket, but you can call me Tim. 

T.H. Lehnen is an author who believes that young adult and children’s literature is simply more honest about the magic in the world. Under Aspen & Thorn Press, he writes young adult fantasy for children who are old souls, and old souls who are children at heart.

He lives with his family in Portland, OR, and studied creative writing, philosophy, and English literature at Reed College. When he is not writing, he is tinkering with machines mechanical and digital (though he has yet to figure out how to transport a sports car through a wardrobe).
body.summary: T.H Lehnen is the pen name of Timothy MacKay Hestenes Lehnen, an author of young adult fiction. Check out his new novel Fog & Fireflies.
